params.name: images
params.description: The image or batch of images to be prepared. Each image can be a PIL image, NumPy array or PyTorchtensor. Both channels-first and channels-last formats are supported.

params.name: text
params.description: The sequence or batch of sequences to be encoded. Each sequence can be a string or a list of strings(pretokenized string). If the sequences are provided as list of strings (pretokenized), you must setis_split_into_words=True (to lift the ambiguity with a batch of sequences).
